summary: "Never Let Me Go" is a 2010 British movie based on Kazuo Ishiguro's novel. It's about three friends, Kathy, Ruth, and Tommy, who discover a dark secret about their future. The film stars Carey Mulligan, Keira Knightley, and Andrew Garfield. It was well-received by critics and audiences for its powerful message and acting. The movie was made with a $15 million budget and did well in ticket sales and DVD revenue.
title: Never Let Me Go (2010 film)
